short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert currency in your browser new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Convert Currency Quickly Extension gives you an easy way for converting currency into a different country wise format and gives you an easy way to change your Chrome Browser new tab default to look attractive and pleasing to the eye. This is a free add-on for Chrome Browser where the primary target is to convert prices (from major currencies) easily and quickly. Also, set a background from our selective currency images gallery powered by Unsplash in your Chrome Browser default new tab. We are actually changing your Chrome browser default new tab page.

Also as an added feature, we are giving you an easy way to search your desired information, images, video, and more through Bing search. A digital clock in new tabs where you can check your current location time in 12 hour/ 24-hour format according to your preference.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Convert Currency Quickly"  Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy 
(https://vobis.tv/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://vobis.tv/terms-conditions/).
